attributes.action: reduce or scrap the VAT on heating oil
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent fluctuation in the price of oil to record levels has had an affect on how much poeple are having to pay to heat there houses. People who are under 60 do not get a heating allowance and are struggling financially to heat there families. Please can the government look into abolishing the vat on heating oil so honest hard working people can at least afford to keep there children warm this winter.
